## What are containers?

* The operating system is made up of many building blocks
* Containers are 

```{mermaid}
graph LR
    subgraph Hardware
        CPU
        Memory
        Devices
    end

    subgraph Kernel
        Control
        Manage_Resources
        Device_Management
    end

    subgraph Operating_System
        System_Services
    end

    subgraph User
        Application_Programs
    end

    User --> Operating_System
    Operating_System --> Kernel
    Kernel --> Hardware
```
